description: Tension in Dijon, France, is rising over the alleged assault on the teenage boy by a drug dealer.
title: Dijon: Police brought in to tackle Chechen violence
title_page: Dijon: Police brought in to tackle Chechen violence - BBC News
maintext: Bernard Schmeltz, the top state official in the region, said in a statement that the violence "appeared to be part of a settling of scores between members of the Chechen community in France and residents" of Dijon.
